page.title: 15THE ST.JOHN'S SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: The St.Johns Sport and Y Centre houses a large selection of activities which are available for young and old. This modern complex provides facilities for swimming, diving, badminton, squash, table tennis,roller-skating and many other sports and hobbies. Every Friday there is a Y club for teenagers when many of these sports can be enjoyed. On Saturday there are two Roller Discos. During the week there are also 'Tiny's' gym lessons, computing and martial arts. A new, exciting development is the Pagoda Youth Actities Centre, opened in April 1985 next door to the main sports complex. This consists of a central socialising area with small specialist rooms leading off from it. In these there are facilities for woodwork, computing, drama, dance, photography, art, motor maintenance and many sports.
